means: 集中起来的，经过浓缩的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"集中，聚集"之意。
means: concentrate ： 指把人或物集中在一起，也可指把精力或注意力集中于某一事物上。
focus ： 侧重指把光、热、射线等集中于一点，也可指把思想或精力等集中于某人或某事情上。

word_mean: 浓缩：减少体积而使其浓度增加
浓缩剂(物)：通过对其无效成分的蒸发而使其效能增强的药物

sentence.Network_en: They will concentrate on teaching the basics of reading, writing and arithmetic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将集中教授阅读、写作和算术基础知识。

sentence.Network_en: We must concentrate our energies on treating addiction first.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须首先集中精力治疗毒瘾。

sentence.Network_en: A term in prison will concentrate his mind wonderfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 一想到要被判刑，他的头脑就会变得非常清醒。

list.abs: 机械加工英语词汇_百度文库 ... 气动夹紧 pneuma-lock; 同心，同心度 concentricity; 垂直度 perpendicular.
传统的测定方法最常用的结果表达是PC20。P表示“激发的（provoking）“；C表示激发剂的“浓度（concentration）“；20表示通气功能指标下降20%。所以，PC20即引起通气功能指标（如FEV1）下降20%的激发剂.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... concentrate 集中；浓缩 concentration 集中；浓缩 concentric 同心的；集中的.
集中器（concentrator）(Concentrator)是连接终端、计算机或通信设备的中心连接点设备。它能成为电缆会合的中心点。
核能专业术语(7) ... concentration of ore by artificial radioactivity 人工放射性选矿 concentrator 浓缩器 concentric 同心的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'bring towards a centre'): Latinized form of concentre, or from French concentrer 'to concentrate'. Sense 1 dates from the early 20th cent

entry.def: If you concentrate on something, or concentrate your mind on it, you give all your attention to it.

example.ex: It was up to him to concentrate on his studies and make something of himself...
example.tran: 是否能专心学习并取得一定成就要靠他自己。

example.ex: Water companies should concentrate on reducing waste instead of building new reservoirs...
example.tran: 自来水公司应该集中精力减少水浪费，而不是修建新水库。

entry.def: If something is concentrated in an area, it is all there rather than being spread around.

example.ex: Italy's industrial districts are concentrated in its north-central and north-eastern regions...
example.tran: 意大利的工业区集中在该国中北部和东北部地区。

example.ex: Most development has been concentrated in and around cities.
example.tran: 土地开发主要集中在城市及周边地区。

entry.def: Concentrate is a liquid or substance from which water has been removed in order to make it stronger, or to make it easier to store.

example.tran: 用浓缩橙汁冲兑的橙汁

entry.def: If you say that an unpleasant fact or situation concentrates someone's mind, you mean that it makes them think clearly, because they are aware of the serious consequences if they do not.

example.ex: A term in prison will concentrate his mind wonderfully.
example.tran: 一想到要被判刑，他的头脑就会变得非常清醒。

means.word_mean: 1. the desired mineral that is left after impurities have been removed from mined ore
2. a concentrated form of a foodstuff; the bulk is reduced by removing water
1. make (the solvent of a solution) dense or denser

sentences.sentence: "Please focus on your studies and not on your hobbies"
"The Russian government centralized the distribution of food"
"condense the contents of a book into a summary"

means.word_mean: 5. draw together or meet in one common center;

sentences.sentence: "These groups concentrate in the inner cities"
"Congress condensed the three-year plan into a six-month plan"

means.word_mean: 7. be cooked until very little liquid is left;

sentences.sentence: "The sauce should reduce to one cup"

means.word_mean: 8. cook until very little liquid is left;

sentences.sentence: "The cook reduced the sauce by boiling it for a long time"

stems_affixes.word_buile: a无+centric[[adj.中心的]]行牡摹鷄dj.无中心的
centri=centr中心+pet追+al……的→追求中心的→向心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 古怪的,怪癖的,异乎寻常的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ec出+centric[[adj.中心的]]→adj.古怪的,怪癖的,异乎寻常的n.古怪的人
ego自我+centric[adj.中心的]→adj.自我中心的,利己的
xeno外国+centric[adj.中心的]→adj.喜爱外国之文化的
centre[n.中心, 中央 v.集中]→n.中心
centr中心+e→n.中心, 中央 v.集中
concentrate[v.集中;浓缩]+ion动作或状态→concentration集中;浓缩
ec出+centric[[adj.中心的]]→adj.古怪的,怪癖的,异乎寻常的n.古怪的人
eccentric[adj.古怪的,怪癖的,异乎寻常的n.古怪的人]+ity表名词→n.反常,怪癖
de离开+central[adj.中心的]+ize表动词→离开中心
centr中心+e→n.中心, 中央 v.集中
con共同+centr中心+ate做→中心共同→集中

Sentence.sentence: But while much of the research and innovation has concentrated on finding less-polluting energy alternatives, it may be decades before clean technologies like wind and solar meet a significant portion of our energy needs.
It renders us unable to concentrate.
As for the drawbacks of illegal immigration, these, too, are concentrated.

means.word_mean: 专心于; 注意; 集中（注意力）; 聚精会神

sentences.en: I can't concentrate when I'm hungry.
sentences.cn: 我饿了就无法集中精力。

means.word_mean: 集中, 聚集, 使…集中（或集合、聚集）

sentences.en: The general decided to concentrate his forces near the capital.
sentences.cn: 这位将军决定把他的部队集中在首都附近。

sentences.en: An acid solution is concentrated when it has very much acid in it.
sentences.cn: 当酸性溶液里含有很多酸时, 它就被浓缩了。

jushi.chinese: 我饿了就无法集中精力。

jushi.english: I can't concentrate amid all these distractions.
jushi.chinese: 在这些干扰中,我不能集中心思。

jushi.english: An acid solution is concentrated when it has very much acid in it.
jushi.chinese: 当酸溶液里含有很多酸时,它就被浓缩了。
